name: ucfr-desktop
description: Scaffolded Electron + React desktop app with mocked authentication and API flows.
author: Stability Protocol <contact@stabilityprotocol.com>

scripts.build:preload: tsc src/preload/index.ts --outDir app/preload --module commonjs --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration false
scripts.watch:preload: tsc src/preload/index.ts --outDir app/preload --module commonjs --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration false --watch
scripts.dev: yarn build:preload && concurrently -k "yarn watch:preload" "vite --host" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && nodemon --watch src/main --watch app/preload --exec 'electron electron-main.js'"
scripts.build:icons: electron-icon-builder --input=./src/assets/monolith-initials.png --output=./src/assets/icons --flatten && mv src/assets/icons/icons/* src/assets/icons/ && rmdir src/assets/icons/icons && cp src/assets/icons/512x512.png src/assets/icons/icon.png
scripts.build: yarn build:icons && yarn build:preload && yarn build:renderer && yarn build:main && electron-builder
